name: Warhammer: Vermintide 2
content:
game:
  appid: 552500
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine Prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: ie8
    arch: win64
    description: Installing Internet Explorer 8
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: vcrun2012
    arch: win64
    description: Installing Visual C++ 2012
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: vcrun2015
    arch: win64
    description: Installing Visual C++ 2015
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: dotnet472
    arch: win64
    description: Installing Dot.NET 4.7.2
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win64
    description: Switching to Windows 7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
winesteam:
  dxvk: true
  overrides:
    xaudio2_7: native,builtin
  version: tkg-4.0-x86_64
